Xinlei(Ray) Chen

I have always thought that I would love to live by the sea, to travel the world alone and live my life more simply.

About

I'm a Computing Science Graduate student at University of Alberta. My researches mainly focus on Sensor Data Analysis (e.x. Anomaly Detection,  Non-intrusive Load Monitoring) and Sustainable Computing.

Currently,  I'm under supervision of Dr. Omid Ardakanian.  And I'm also working in Sustainable Computing Lab which studies the foundations of Cyber-Physical Systems and the Internet of Things.  You can also visit the projects page on this website to get an idea of what I have recently been working on.
